name: Cut the Cheese
description:
Cut the Cheese - a brand new awesome game for everyone!

Best cheese slicer on iOS! Swipe with your finger and cut the part of cheese without mice. Be patient or go for a fast win, listen to the funny soundtrack and in-game sounds, progress in many different levels with mold and weed, meet new mouse types with different super powers! Unlock special boosts and use them to master the harder levels! Be the best among your friends and become the ultimate CHEESE MASTER! There is enough cheese for everyone, do a slash and grab a slice of cheese for yourself.

Features:
More than 80 different levels with various gameplay elements!
Funny sounds and soundtrack!
Many super-powers to win the combat for cheese!
Smooth slice technology so you can concentrate on your skill!

Go and help these mice to grab as much cheese as you can and bring it back to the farm! This game is easy enough for the kids but every adult will find it fun as well!

Music and sounds:
http://www.freesfx.co.uk/
"Monkeys Spinning Monkeys" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Sneaky Snitch" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
